content:
During the night, Russian troops fired at the Nikopol district of Dnipropetrovsk region three times.

About thisreportedHead of Dnipropetrovsk Regional State Administration Sergey Lisak.

The enemy continued the terror of the inhabitants of Marganetsky, Chervonohrigor communities and Nikopol himself. He released from a dozen arts.

The shelling has damaged the church and four private homes. The mutilated transmission line.

There are no dead and victims. In other areas of Dnipropetrovsk region passed without arrivals.

As reported by the Armyinform, in Kiev as a result of rocket attack of the Russian Federationaffected10 people.
title: The enemy was attacked three times by the Nikopol region, damaged church and private homes
description: This was reported by the head of the Dnipropetrovsk Regional State Administration Sergey Lisak. The enemy continued terror ...
author: Army Inform
